definition: bit (of a bridle)/to hold in the mouth/to harbor (feelings)/to link/to accept/rank/title

sentences.english: I was the only person in the delegation without an official title.
sentences.chinese: 我當時是代表團中唯一沒有官銜的人員。

sentences.english: The black procession came out into the thin, cold light and wind of early morning.
sentences.chinese: 那黑暗的隊列走進了稀薄，冰冷的官銜和清早的風裏。

definition: Zhang Juzheng (1525-1582), Grand Secretary during the Ming dynasty, credited with bringing the dynasty to its apogee
Xiao He (-193 BC), famous strategist and chancellor, fought on Liu Bang's 劉邦|刘邦[Liu2 Bang1] side during the Chu-Han Contention 楚漢戰爭|楚汉战争[Chu3 Han4 Zhan4 zheng1]
members of the Hanlin Imperial Academy 翰林院, employed as imperial secretaries from the Tang onwards
to adopt/to give for adoption (usually to a childless relative)
Jiangling county in Jingzhou 荊州|荆州[Jing1 zhou1], Hubei
Zanhuang county in Shijiazhuang 石家莊|石家庄[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1], Hebei
